startScreen.title: Get started with your project
startScreen.subtitle: Click on any preview bellow to open a page

slide1.title: Introducing Novi Builder
slide1.subtitle:
Your irreplaceable tool for instant HTML websites creation 
and maintenance.
slide1.body:
Novi Builder is an innovative visual HTML page builder, which allows you to 
quickly assemble pages from pre-made blocks and visually edit their 
content. Use the feature of working with your website’s source code, 
available only in Novi Builder.

slide2.title: Managing pages
slide2.subtitle:
Create, edit, delete, and manage the settings of your project’s
 web pages with “Page Manager”.
slide2.body:
Use a simple click to open the desired page or to create a new one. To
 delete or access additional actions, use the context menu on the selected
 page.

slide3.title: Separate Task — Separate Mode
slide3.subtitle:
Browse, edit, develop and create the design of your future
 website with «Preview», «Edit», and «Design» modes.
slide3.bodyParagraph1:
To view the intermediate results of your work with a project, use
 the #{previewIcon} Preview mode.
slide3.bodyParagraph2:
Use the #{editIcon} Edit mode to edit text and move, create, or delete elements
 sections on your page as quickly as possible.
slide3.bodyParagraph3:
Become a designer with the #{designIcon} Design mode. Work on the level of layers
 elements (while pressing #{commandSymbol} on keyboard ) in the workspace of this mode
 or use access to the source code of your project.

slide4.title: Developer Tools
slide4.subtitle:
Get the enhanced features to create your HTML website with
 the help of developer tools in «Develop» mode.
slide4.bodyParagraph1:
Experience an absolutely new way of work with visual HTML page builders.
 Use the power of HTML, CSS, and JS editor in its usual form and edit the
 source code of your project just as you would have done it in any standard
 code editor. Emmet and code highlight allow you to speed up your work.
slide4.bodyParagraph2:
Save snippets of your project in a completely new way using the Preset
 Manager. Select any available element in the workspace of your active page
 and save it via #{savePresetIcon} Save as Preset in the context menu.
 Use existing presets just by dragging them to the page.

slide5.title: Instant Publishing
slide5.subtitle:
Keep the version of your website up-to-date using the instant
 publication of your project directly to the server with Novi.
slide5.body:
Press the #{publishIcon} Publish Site button to publish your project right on the
 server, where Novi Builder is located. You can change the path of your
 project’s publication, using the «Publication Path» option
 in «Configuration» dialog.

slide6.title: Additional Features
slide6.subtitle:
Perform additional actions with your project using the Novi's
 system panel.
slide6.bodyParagraph1: Change the workspace size by clicking #{resizeIcon} Change Resolution button.
slide6.bodyParagraph2: Press #{settingsIcon} Settings to obtain access to the settings of the page, project etc.
slide6.bodyParagraph3:
Use Novi Layers feature to improve the user experience of your project.
 Create the rules of insertion, movement, deletion, and other actions in a
 convenient form via standard CSS selectors.
slide6.bodyParagraph4:
Download the template of your project to give it to your clients or to transfer
 it to other devices by pressing #{downloadIcon} Download Template button.
slide6.bodyParagraph5: Press #{saveIcon} Save Project button to save your project for future use.
slide6.bodyParagraph6:
Use the feedback form  to get in touch with us. Send your ideas and
 suggestions. We are always happy to communicate with you.
